ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] pictures
ygData.msgSnippet: Since I receive posts via email, I don t normally tend to go to the website much.  So a picture wouldn t make much difference to me.  However, why not just
ygData.messageBody:
Since I receive posts via email, I don't normally tend to go to the website much.  So a picture wouldn't make much difference to me.  However, why not just take a stock logo of EverQuest, run it through Photoshop and add "@yahoogroups.com" to it?  It's not like there's one particular picture that's going to summarize the essence of what this group is all about.
 
But it's "ur list" so do what you want with the picture!
 
Wulfric
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, June 12, 2005 6:13 AM
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] pictures

If I can find one. And can you pretty please not use "ur". It's my pet peeve.
Anyone know where I can find a good picture for the group? Or any suggestions?
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-06-11, 16:08:00 you wrote: =======

>pretty please, ur being the owner can u add a main picture for the group?
>
>Su <suceress@...> wrote:Because of spammers. Before I turned posting pictures off there were some spammers uploading things that had nothing to do with EverQuest so I had to turn it off to prevent it. They were doing that for file uploading as well so I had to disable that.
>Otherwise we'd be getting graphics of ads for lousy porn and probably those annoying ones about Islam. Possibly those scams from Nigeria as well.
>luv,
>-Su ~list owner~
>
